com.esri.mo2.client.aims
Class FolderItem

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--com.esri.mo2.client.aims.FolderItem
public class FolderItem
extends Object

A FolderItem represents the data that is to be stored in a Folder on the Application Server. This could be Mapnotes data, Editnotes data, or any other type of data to be stored in the form of cookies on the server. FolderItemData is added to a FolderItem in the form of cookies and sent to the server via ADMIN Axl requests. Administrator displays the folders and folderitems.

The following classes are used:

      - FolderUtil
      - FolderItemData

Example:

  if (folderItemData != null)
  for (int i = 0; i < folderItemData.length; ++i)  {
  folderItem.addData(folderItemData[i]);
  }
  }
